This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: A red orb appeared suddenly and was visible for 30 seconds before disappearing.
divs: sighting detailsafter hearing of recent ufo activity in my area [youtube link moved to additional evidence section\cms\tg] i was curious if the ufos were still active. after 20 minutes of watching the skies from my bedroom window i saw a red orb appear, it was approximately 2 miles away. it was visible for 30 seconds before vanishing. other ufo watchers several miles away reported seeing no activity on this night but i believe that the low altitude of the orb combined with the hilly terrain of western pennsylvania placed the orb out of their field of view.
